value.name: Judge Beverly Martin's Dissents Show Concern Over 'Harsh' Sentences
value.description: Judge Beverly Martin said in a 2018 dissent that “at every turn” her colleagues in the majority have “erred in ways that stopped prisoners from getting their sentences reviewed and prevented people who had meritorious claims from getting relief.

value.name: Harold Murphy
value.description: Body Of Erica Hernandez, Texas Mother Missing For Weeks, Found In PondThe body of a Texas mother who had been missing for weeks was found in an SUV in a pond on Tuesday, police confirmed.

value.name: Outraged Angela Garmley Said She Had Been "Set Up" By Judge At Time Of Her Arrest
value.description: An outraged Angela Garmley told officers that a metal can of meth found under her car was not hers and that she knew she had been "set up" by Murray County Chief Magistrate Bryant Cochran.
